title: Katie Price 'confirms' she’s back with on/off boyfriend Kris Boyson
text:
So…they’re back on? (Pictures: Instagram)

Katie Price appeared to be back with her boyfriend Kris Boyson as she brought her man and her kids together for a sweet snap.

After spending the night with son Junior, Kris also fawned over Katie’s young daughter Bunny, seemingly after the 41-year-old reconciled with her on-off partner.

It comes after Katie slammed ‘little boy’ Charles Drury, after he did a tell-all on their short dalliance while the reality star was on a break from weight loss specialist Kris.

Now she’s back with the 31-year-old, after she posted an adorable shot of Kris with her daughter.

In the Instagram shot, Kris looked thrilled to be reunited with five-year-old Bunny, and she seemed enamoured with him, as the pair smiled at one another.

Katie captioned the photo: ‘Love this picture of my Bunny boo and @krisboyson💕.’

Many fans were stumped by the image, which appeared to confirm Katie was back with Kris.

Katie and Kris took Junior out (Picture: Instagram)

This is cute (Picture: Instagram)

Basically, we all have whiplash.

Advertisement

Still, it’s a pretty flippin’ cute shot, so let’s just enjoy it for what it is, right?

It wasn’t just Bunny who was hanging with Kris, though, as Katie spent Sunday night with her partner, and son Junior.

Katie looked thrilled to be hanging with her 14-year-old son with Peter Andre when recent shots emerged of the two enjoying some mother-son time on social media.

Taking part in some Halloween fun, Junior posed alongside his mother and Kris with Katie captioning the photo: ‘Scary night.’

We need more information, Pricey. Are we talking haunted house antics or…?

After becoming engaged earlier this year, Katie and Kris briefly split and Katie went on to have a short-lived fling with 22-year-old Charles Drury, 22.

Now it appeared Katie was well and truly putting the drama of recent times behind her, after Charles made claims about their ‘drug-fuelled’ night of ‘1/10’ passion.

Katie recently dated Charles (Picture: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

Katie and Kris are back on (Picture: Rex Features)

She slammed his tell-all and branded him a ‘little boy’ as the to and fro continued.

In July Katie confirmed on Loose Women that she was engaged to Kris after he popped the question. Flashing a huge diamond, Katie said: ‘Kris bought the ring for that finger, so there you go, I’ve got love in my life.

‘The thing is, he puts me in my place, he’s strict with me and I’m not used to that. He’s a good guy, he’s so good with Harvey, Harvey is obsessed with him. Things are actually going well. I’ve got the man. I’m happy.’

The former Celebrity Big Brother star – who is mum to Harvey, 17, with ex Dwight Yorke, Junior and 12-year-old Princess with ex-husband Peter, and Jett, six, and Bunny, with ex Kieran Hayler – previously dated Alex Adderson after splitting from Kris last year.
